verses.name: Romans 11:33
verses.text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out!

verses.name: Romans 11:34
verses.text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor?

verses.name: Romans 11:35
verses.text: Or who hath first given to him, and it shall be recompensed unto him again?

verses.name: Romans 11:36
verses.text: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.
